headline: Ball Corp Teams Up With Ayna to Accelerate Aluminum Cup Business
summary: BALL forms a joint venture named Oasis Venture with Ayna to fuel the expansion of its Aluminum Cup business.

headline: Ball sells majority stake in aluminum cups business, forming joint venture
summary: Ball believes the joint venture, Oasis Venture Holdings, will grow its underperforming metal cups business, and it anticipates a $25 million year-over-year improvement following the asset sale.

raw.headline: Ball sells majority stake in aluminum cups business, forming joint venture
raw.summary: Ball believes the joint venture, Oasis Venture Holdings, will grow its underperforming metal cups business, and it anticipates a $25 million year-over-year improvement following the asset sale.
